answerText: Journey to the End of the Night [or Voyage au Bout de la Nuit][10] Journey to the End of the Night was written by this racist French author. His other novels include Death on Credit and Castle to Castle.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | UVA A + OSU A | 6 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel establishes a medical office in a fictional poor Paris suburb called La Garenne-Rancy. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel which innovatively employed vernacular speech and extensive use of ellipses in describing the adventures of Ferdinand Bardamu.
